Description: Remains of a painted wooden coffin, lid now missing and sides separated from the base-board, containing a fake mummy, consisting of packing and various animal bones wrapped in linen bandages and originally covered with polychrome painted cartonnage, the remains of a moulded mask remain on the underside, now very fragmentary.
Bibliographic references: Fletcher, Antoine and Hill 2014 / Regarding the Dead: Human Remains in the British Museum (p.104)
